attributes.action: lobby the Chinese government to stop mass killing of dogs and cats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: World animal organizations report that China has already killed large numbers of stray cats and dogs in preparation for the Olympic games and have banned the eating of dog meat for the duration of the games so as not to offend  tourists. This is unnacceptable and this barbarism to dogs and cats must be eradicated permanently in China if they want foreign tourism and trade to continue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
